function.name: Taobao_search_goods
function.description: Taobao's product search function supports massive product retrieval and can intelligently recommend related products based on user preferences.

arrived_tomorrow.description: arrived_tomorrow filter, it is True if only arrived_tomorrow products else False for all products (including non arrived_tomorrow)

free_shipping.description: Free shipping filter, it is True if only free shipping products else False for all products (including non-free shipping)

function.name: JD_search_goods
function.description: JD's product search function, known for genuine product guarantees and fast delivery through efficient logistics, is particularly suitable for electronics and appliance categories.

arrived_tomorrow.description: arrived_tomorrow filter, it is True if only arrived_tomorrow products else False for all products (including non arrived_tomorrow)

free_shipping.description: Free shipping filter, it is True if only free shipping products else False for all products (including non-free shipping)

function.name: Pinduoduo_search_goods
function.description: Pinduoduo's product search function focuses on low-price product discovery, aggregating a massive selection of factory-direct and group-buying deals, ideal for price-conscious users.

arrived_tomorrow.description: arrived_tomorrow filter, it is True if only arrived_tomorrow products else False for all products (including non arrived_tomorrow)

free_shipping.description: Free shipping filter, it is True if only free shipping products else False for all products (including non-free shipping)
